remarks: Value of the rank function.  Definition 9.14 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 79 (proved as a theorem from our definition).  This variant of ~ rankval expresses the class existence requirement as an antecedent instead of a hypothesis.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Oct-2003.)
statement:
rankvalg $p |- ( A e. V -> ( rank ` A ) = |^| { x e. On | A e. ( R1 ` suc x ) } ) $.
$d A x $.
